content: round head in a square hat yarn garnstudio drops fabel 75% superwash wool 25% polyamid 50 grams = 205 metres 1 ball needles 2 5mm circular or dpns 2 75mm circular or dpns sizes baby child adult large adult gauge 27 stitches = 10cm in stocking stitch on 2 75mm needles using 2 5mm needles cast on 80 100 120 140 stitches and join for knitting in the round work k3 p1 around for 12 14 16 18 rounds work k3 pfb around 100 125 150 175 stitches total change to 2 75mm needles work in stocking stitch until piece measures 16 18 20 22 cm cast off using kitchener stitch ©2011 elsteffo
